item.title: Help with coding

item.description:

does not exist in my server, where would I add it?

item.title: Help with coding
item.dc:creator: @Sp3ke Sp3ke
item.description:
@Sp3ke wrote:

That’s why you declare it in a list which dosen’t allow you to trade it.

public int[] noTrade = {ItemID’s};

Read full topic

item.title: Help with coding
item.dc:creator: @mandood77 mandood77
item.description:
@mandood77 wrote:

[quote=“Jddogg9, post:3, topic:302098”][quote author=I need a username link=topic=398429.msg2956578#msg2956578 date=1252869507]
Wherever “Death” or “dead” is Add something like this:
&& if.Player.HasItem(“Firecape id”);
AddItem(“Firecape id”);
Death coding here
Else{
Regular death coding Here
[/quote]

but wouldn’t that make it drop the firecape, and put it in your inventory?[/quote] That would almost be duping than, someone uses 2 accounts (logs into botth) one of them having a firecape, uses the other account to kill the one with the firecape, and boom, duped a firecape.

Read full topic
